source.45fea13c:
#Code by Pei-Yi Hung  https://www.kaggle.com/hongpeiyi/image-classification-with-fastai

img_path = Path("../input/covers/images_copy")
img_fnames = get_image_files(img_path)
dls = ImageDataLoaders.from_path_func(path=img_path, 
                                      fnames=img_fnames,
                                      label_func=parent_label,
                                      item_tfms=RandomResizedCrop(460, min_scale=0.3),
                                      batch_tfms=[*aug_transforms(size=224),
                                                  Normalize.from_stats(*imagenet_stats)])
source.8e2d46d8:
#Code by Pei-Yi Hung  https://www.kaggle.com/hongpeiyi/image-classification-with-fastai

learn = cnn_learner(dls, resnet50, 
                    loss_func=nn.CrossEntropyLoss(),
                    metrics=accuracy,
                    path="./")
